summary:
SUPER HIGH QUALITY DOF.
Low performance loss.
Perfect.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#000000][size=6][youtube]WQKSz7Jv30w[/youtube]
WHAT IS MixUp ENB?[/size][/color]
[/b][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]My ENB is made to make the land of skyrim less gloomy and more pronounced while staying friendly to the lore. Its really just my personal favorite setting I made due to not finding an ENB preset to tickle my fancy So if you enjoy tell me about it and upload some screenshots! :) Keep In mind the ENB isnt made from scratch, but from RealVision Option 3 Preset I feel i should say this even though they arent similar besides the Saturation of colors... Thanks[/size][/color]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#00ffff][size=5]

EXTREME QUALITY SSAO[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][size=5]SUPER HIGH QUALITY DOF.
[/size][/font][color=#00ffff]Low performance loss.
[/color][font=Georgia][size=5]Amazing Sun shafts[/size][/font]
[color=#00ffff]Optional Ambient Occlusion
[/color][font=Georgia][size=5]COLORFUL [/size][/font][color=#ff0000]S[/color][color=#ff7700]C[/color][color=#ffff00]E[/color][color=#00ff00]N[/color][font=Georgia][color=#1e84cc][size=5]E[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#0000ff][size=5]R[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][size=5][color=#9900ff]Y
[/color]
[color=#93c47d]THIS IS SKYRIM MADE REFRESHING![/color]


[color=#ff0000]
[/color][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=6][color=#ff0000]This is made off of enb preset 236 [/color][color=#f4f4f4]http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0236.html [/color][color=#ff0000]<DOWNLOAD DLL AND DROP INTO DIRECTORY WITH MY PRESET :)[/color]


[/size][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=6][Imagespace]
[/size][size=6]bDoDepthOfField=1 <--- turn it to 0 if you want crystal clear underwater
[/size][size=6][Display][/size][size=6]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 <--- IMPORTANT! Without this value, ENB WONT WORK CORRECTLY
fGamma=1.2400

[/size][/color][/font][font=Courier New][color=#ffff00][size=6]ENDORSE AND DOWNLOAD :) TELL ME HOW YOU LIKE IT



[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#000000][size=6]REQUIRES 3Ghz CPU or Better Nvidia GTX 660 Or equal for AMD

[/size][/color][/font][size=6]I ALSO USE [color=#ff00ff]Enhanced Lights and FX[/color] WITH [color=#8e7cc3]CLIMATES OF TAMRIEL[/color] [color=#38761d]<HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
[/color][color=#8e7cc3]COT>[/color] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?
[color=#ff00ff]ELEX>[/color] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?


INSTRUCTIONS

1- Download My enb
2- Download The Dll from here http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0236.html 
3- Extract both files to desktop
4- Once youve done so open the enb files and move all of them to your main skyrim directory
5- Open the ENB series folder, Then the Wrapper Folder and move the D39dll to your game directory as well
6- Profit?

Same steps apply for 99% of ENBs quite simple :) ENJOY
[/size]
